seo.title: Zima w Positano niskim kosztem
seo.description: Jak wygląda Positano zimą: otwarte lokale, transport i budżetowe wskazówki.

sections.title: Budget-friendly days
body: Schedule museum days in Naples or Salerno on wet forecasts; round-trip train fares hover around €10 (approx. US$11).
Hike the Path of the Gods from Nocelle when skies clear: crisp air, empty viewpoints, and no summer heat.

tips: Sunset is earlier (around 16:45 in December)—plan terrace time for late afternoon and pack a warm layer.
